data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Saratov an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saratov, Russia

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Saratov, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Saratov, Russia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Saratov, Russia.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Nanai, Hezhen people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Saratov, Russia.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 2,648,500 people living in the state of Saratov.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 2,648,500 souls in Saratov and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

location.name: Saratov
location.people_groups_list: Alutor, Aleut, Eastern, Yukagir, Lezgin, Chechen
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Alutor (2,000), Aleut, Eastern (500), Yukagir (1,600), Lezgin (3,900), Chechen (5,300)
